message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you wanting a larger share Alice, but my offer is more equitable.  Let's get this done before inflation hurts us both.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's better than what we'll both get if we wait any longer.
Alice, this is a fair deal considering the inflation. We're running out of time to make a sensible agreement.
